          '---','\n',

          '---','\n',
          'number of higher-level cells in the design (abstracting over Order and Quantity) = Item(4) * Number(2) * Vagueness(2) = ',4*2*2,'\n',
          'number of times a subject saw a higher level cell in the design =  = 256 / 16 = ', 4*2*2, '\n',
          sep=''))
